str2: Happy, blessed, to be envied. A prolonged form of the poetical makar; supremely blest; by extension, fortunate, well off.
A male human being; a man, husband. A primary word; a man.
Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To reckon, count, charge with; reason, decide, conclude; think, suppose.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Genitive Masculine Singular
